org.apache.ignite.ml.selection.scoring.evaluator

Class Evaluator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.selection.scoring.evaluator.Evaluator

  • public class Evaluator
extends Object
    Evaluator that computes metrics from predictions and ground truth values.

        public static <K,V> EvaluationResult evaluate(DatasetBuilder<K,V> datasetBuilder,

                                              Preprocessor<K,V> preprocessor,
                                              Metric... metrics)

        Type Parameters:
        K - Type of key.
